Sentencas: Combined heat and power (CHP) is a promising technological configuration for reducing energy consumption and increasing energy security in the domestic built environment.
Titulo: Emission and economic performance assessment of a solid oxide fuel cell micro-combined heat and power system in a domestic building

Sentencas: Fuel cells, on account of their: high electrical efficiency, low emissions and useful heat output have been identified as a key technological option for improving both building energy efficiency and reducing emissions in domestic CHP applications.
Titulo: Emission and economic performance assessment of a solid oxide fuel cell micro-combined heat and power system in a domestic building

Sentencas: The work presented in this paper builds upon results currently reported in the literature of fuel cells operating in domestic building applications, with an emission and economic performance assessment of a real, commercially available SOFC mCHP system operating in a real building; under a UK context.
Titulo: Emission and economic performance assessment of a solid oxide fuel cell micro-combined heat and power system in a domestic building

Sentencas: This paper aims to assess the emission and economic performance of a commercially available solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) mCHP system, operating at The University of Nottingham's Creative Energy Homes.
Titulo: Emission and economic performance assessment of a solid oxide fuel cell micro-combined heat and power system in a domestic building

Sentencas: The performance assessment evaluates, over a one year period, the associated carbon (emission assessment) and operational costs (economic assessment) of the SOFC mCHP case compared to a 'base case' of grid electricity and a highly efficient gas boiler.
Titulo: Emission and economic performance assessment of a solid oxide fuel cell micro-combined heat and power system in a domestic building

Sentencas: Results from the annual assessment show that the SOFC mCHP system can generate annual emission reductions of up to 56% and cost reductions of 177% compared to the base case scenario.
Titulo: Emission and economic performance assessment of a solid oxide fuel cell micro-combined heat and power system in a domestic building

Sentencas: However support mechanisms such as; electrical export, feed in tariff and export tariff, are required in order to achieve this, the results are significantly less without.
Titulo: Emission and economic performance assessment of a solid oxide fuel cell micro-combined heat and power system in a domestic building

Sentencas: A net present value (NPV) analysis shows that the base case is still more profitable over a 15 year period, even though the SOFC mCHP system generates annual revenue; this is on account of the SOFC's high capital cost.
Titulo: Emission and economic performance assessment of a solid oxide fuel cell micro-combined heat and power system in a domestic building

Sentencas: In summary, grid interaction and incubator support is essential for significant annual emission and cost reductions compared to a grid electricity and gas boiler scenario.
Titulo: Emission and economic performance assessment of a solid oxide fuel cell micro-combined heat and power system in a domestic building

Sentencas: Currently capital cost is the greatest barrier to the economic viability of the system.
Titulo: Emission and economic performance assessment of a solid oxide fuel cell micro-combined heat and power system in a domestic building
